name: Texas A&M Agronomy Society
description: Our mission is to increase and disseminate knowledge concerning soils and crops and the conditions affecting them, as well as the effects of agriculture on the environment, to foster a spirit of cooperation and mutual helpfulness among students in Agronomy, Soils and Environmental Sciences, and to provide an opportunity for a broader acquaintance with agronomic workers and research activities within the field of Soil, Crop and Environmental Sciences. An important part of our mission is to provide leadership opportunities and training for officers and members and to participate in meaningful community service activities.
